name: Serious Seller
description:
This software is a demo of an elearning software about salesmanship.

It  was made as the subject of a course about team management and rendering a demo.
We worked on this as a full class of 15 students, in a timeline of a few week. Not at fulltime, as we got other projects.

What was given to us was all the documents to create this software : the lessons, the exercises, the scripts for the visual novels.

What we made was : The AD, the Game Design of the exercises, the expressions according to the sentences of the VNs, the different additional texts, the programming.

As we were in a time rush, the AD is heavily inspired from Suumo.
